members.bio: Jeremy manages station operations and handles programming at WDND. He also hosts Real or AI, a game show segment where contestants listen to snippets of real songs and AI-generated tracks and have to guess which is which.
members.name: Jeremy Turner

members.bio: Sarah digs deep into the indie scene to surface tracks you won't hear anywhere else. She also produces promos for the station.
members.name: Sarah M.

members.bio: From classic boom-bap to the latest drops, Mike keeps Tuesday afternoons locked in with the best hip-hop.
members.name: MC Mike

members.bio: Jamie takes listeners on a trip through the decades with the greatest throwback hits from the '80s, '90s, and 2000s.
members.name: DJ Rewind

members.bio: From garage bands to arena anthems, Alex brings the raw power of rock to the airwaves every Wednesday.
members.name: Alex R.

members.bio: Luna curates the smoothest lo-fi and chill beats for winding down midweek. She also manages the station's music library.
members.name: Luna

members.bio: Our award-winning news team covers everything from school events to local community stories that matter.
members.name: The News Team

members.bio: Anyone can take the mic! Request Hour is run by a rotating cast of student guest DJs playing your picks.
members.name: Open Mic
